events.message: Customer reported a collision involving their vehicle on 2024-04-30 which resulted in front-end damage.
Claim reviewed and categorised under Auto Accident cluster due to keywords indicating a car collision.
Assigned claims agent Michael Rogers to oversee the investigation and processing of the automobile accident claim.
Sent formal acknowledgement to customer confirming receipt and initiation of processing for their vehicle accident claim.
Requested police report, vehicle repair estimate, and photos of the vehicle damage to proceed with the claim investigation.
Customer submitted all requested documentation including official police report and mechanicâ€™s damage assessment.
Claims agent began detailed investigation of the accident circumstances based on submitted documents and statements.
Completed review of evidence confirming the customer was not at fault for the car collision; damage verified.
Proposed a settlement amount covering all repair costs and loss of use, sent details to the customer for approval.
Customer responded positively to the proposed settlement, expressing satisfaction with the handling and offer.
Approved claim based on completed investigation and customer agreement to settlement terms for the accident claim.
Processed and issued payment to customer to cover the full settlement amount for vehicle repairs and damages.
Closed the claim file after confirmation that payment was received and repairs were successfully completed.
Archived all documentation and case files related to the automobile accident claim for future reference.
